name: mummy

effect.x-y: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

short_effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

flavor_text.x-y: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Contact with the Pokémon spreads this Ability.
